text.p: This is a game of Hangman. If you don't know how to play Hangman, Wikipedia will tell you.
Only words from the Shavian wiki, and no proper nouns, will appear. Be warned that taboo words are not screened out. It might help you to keep a letter frequency chart to hand.
Note: I am aware that this game is currently far too difficult. Sorry. I will add more lives.
